channel.title: Automatic signing
channel.description: I like this feature within Whonix but is it only verifying .asc pgp files or also sha256sums / sha1? what programs do this - only tor browser or tor and others as well?

item.title: Automatic signing
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
All software obtained by apt-get is automatically verified.
Depends on the vendor of the software.

Read full topic
